item.title: Report X-2024120748
item.description:
Report X-2024120748

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-16T12:32:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-17
  • City: PROVO
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: Union Pacific Railroad
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: CTCX 135700 was found releasing in the UPRR Provo yard. After inspection it was found the vapor valve was in the open position with the secondary plug not installed. Valve was closed and plug secured stopping the release.

item.title: Report X-2024120656
item.description:
Report X-2024120656

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-13T15:15:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-25
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO LEAKING PACKAGE IN TRAILER UPON RETURNING TO PROCESSING AREA AND OPENING BOX DISCOVERED BOX WAS PACKED WITH KRAFT PAPER AND AN INTERNAL BOX CONTAINING SIX 1 GALLON PLASTIC CONTAINER OF HAYMAKER TANKLESS WATER HEATER DESCALER WITHOUT ANY PACKING MATERIAL INSIDE INNER BOX CAUSING ALL 6 CONTAINERS TO BE PRODUCT AGAINST PRODUCT 2 HAD LOOSE CAPS AND LEAKED APPRX. 8 OUNCE OF LIQUID ALL CONTAINERS WERE CONTAMINATED INNER BOX HAD ORIENTATION ARROWS OUTER BOX DID NOT UPON DOING DOCUMENT SEARCH DOT INFORMATION IS A CORROSIVE LIQUID,ACIDIC,ORGANIC,N.O.S. HAZARD CLASS 8 PACKING GROUP III THERE WERENT ANY OUTER OR INNER PACKAGE MARKING STATING THIS LEADING THIS TO BE A SUSPECTED UNDECLARED HAZMAT

item.title: Report X-2024120657
item.description:
Report X-2024120657

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-13T15:15:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-25
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: BROUGHT LEAKING PACKAGE TO PROCESSING CENTER UPON OPENING DISCOVERED THIRTY SIX 19 OUNCE AEROSOL CANS OF LYSOL 3 HAD LOOSE CAPS AND APPROX. THERE WAS 2" OR MORE OF BUBBLE WRAP BUT CONTAINERS WERE STILL PRODUCT AGAINST PRODUCT AND BOX AND SOME WERE PACK ON SIDE UPON DOING DOCUMENT SEARCH DISCOVERED BOX SHOULD BE MARK WITH A LIMITED QUANITY DIAMOND HAZARD LABEL THERE WERENT ANY MARKINGS OR INDICATIONS ON BOX LEADING ME TO BELIEVE THIS IS A SUSPECTED UNDECLARED HAZMAT
